name: The Knight's Tale
description:
The player takes on the role of a knight errant who craves fame and fortune. There are several ways to get this, one of which is tournaments.

The main mechanics of the game are:

  • Shield and spear control using controllers
  • The ability to increase and decrease the speed of the horse
  • Balancing between speed and accuracy - the higher the speed, the harder it is to hit the enemy, the lower the speed, the easier it is to hit, then the greater the chance that they will hit you
